title: Unicorn Wisp Dye
summaries: Unicorn Wisp Dye is a Hardmode, post-Plantera dye that can be acquired by bringing a Strange Plant to the Dye Trader. When equipped, it turns the affected item into a deep shade of pink, and produces a glow effect similar to that of the Wisp in a Bottle.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC50 SC
